title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish made with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti until al dente.
Meanwhile, fry pancetta in a large pan until crispy.
In a bowl, beat eggs and mix with grated cheese and plenty of black pepper.
Reserve 1 cup pasta water, then drain spaghetti.
Remove pan from heat, add spaghetti to pancetta, then quickly pour in egg mixture.
Toss vigorously, adding pasta water if needed to create creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with extra cheese and pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Tender chicken in a rich, creamy, and mildly spiced tomato-based curry.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka spices for at least 1 hour.
Grill or pan-fry chicken until charred and cooked through.
Sauté onions, add garlic, ginger, and more spices.
Pour in tomato passata and simmer.
Add cooked chicken and cream, simmer 10 minutes.
Garnish with cilantro and serve with rice or naan.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: Simple and classic pizza with fresh mozzarella, tomatoes, and basil.
instructions: Spread crushed tomatoes, add torn mozzarella.
Bake 8–12 minutes until crust is golden.
Top with fresh basil and drizzle olive oil.
